document.title: Substance Network - A personal cloud for freedom of expression

heading_ccb97057dcfbeba5840dc8d91c3fdd24.content: In ONE sentence, tell us about your project to strengthen the Internet for free expression and innovation.

7e0937f728ef1c06197b792b664dd12f.content: Using our personal cloud, independent individuals and organisations will be able to self-publish high-quality content, without the restrictions, publishers, media corporation and software vendors are imposing.

heading_a102ba67a82ae1cdacca1b686fe8f300.content: Who will benefit from what you propose? What have you observed that makes you think that?

aaf13f58648d0f4ce995b587ae66ba34.content: Individuals, and organisations who want to get their word out and keep the control about their content.

heading_bcf1867263e2f73be98f0c3f9268a658.content: What progress have you made so far?

f708e9587ed09d589cdb7afb730d78c5.content: Over the last 3,5 yearas we have developed Substance, an extensive, customizable content creation and annotation framework that enables user-centric interfaces and automatic data processing via your web-browser. Thanks to its modular nature it creates an ideal environment for custom integration scenarios.

heading_3711aadc6461df69b89d4bf6f245a7b1.content: What would be a successful outcome for your idea or project?

heading_53a05ea506de98246d2f705b4e171bc6.content: Who is on your team, and what are their relevant experiences or skills?

14ce8ad2bcb032214e25931a17321969.content: Centrally managed proprietary systems are dominating the internet. People are no longer in control of their content, which is resulting in privacy violations, data fraud and censorship. According to the original idea of the internet, people have their own space for expression on the web. The web should function as a democratic medium. We want to take this idea further and develop the Substance Network, a personal cloud tailored for self-expression on the web. Let's reclaim the internet as an open space for everyone.

81adf7552802cb1b41ac70a63f99ae51.content: Unlike hosted platforms platforms, decentralised systems let users decide where their content goes, when it becomes public and when it gets removed. The internet was designed as a decentralised system, so anyone can host their website on a home-computer. We want to strengthen the vision of a decentralized democratic internet, by removing the technical obstactles for end-users. Through mirroring of data decentralized systems are also less vunerable to censorship.

f8796a11d9b48dcc93a706b84ab22e02.content: People should be able to create and share interactive web content without technical knowledge. Our system supports a range of content types such as structured text and images. People can use a desktop application to create, discuss and share their work. What's also special is that we strictly separate content from layout, to allow multi-channel publishing (web, ebook formats, print) without manual intervention.

62e7a96535e332230daebb64d96c6eb7.content: Once your story is online, people will be able to respond using an integrated commenting system. We are exploring the idea of community-controlled quality management in a democratic discussion.

4970e799504b07d0caf91738dfc982ea.content: When using hosted systems, every keystroke is potentially tracked by the system. If a user writes a story, even the removed bits are visible to the platform provider. The fact that data is stored centrally opens the door for fraud and abuse.

2004c57a7f7309b75fb7368b695bb1ba.content: To ensure privacy of the individual editing needs to happen offline again. That's the only safe solution. However, people also want to collaborate. With the Substance Network, we will provide a secure way to share content with trusted people for collaboration.

62ecaa7050b6f4a4508a68d4ba617308.content: We want to establish a fair and easy way of self-publishing on the web. Everyone should be able to express their ideas, and respond to the ideas of others in a democratic way. We want to enable individuals and organisations to install their own collaboration hub and distribution channel, a personal cloud, that doesn't have the restrictions of centrally managed platforms. Such a system is hiding the technical details from the users, so they can publish with a single click, and keep full control about their content. Privacy can be ensured during the collaborative authoring process, so the publication drafts stays private until the user decides to share them publicly or with selected people. By utilizing a decentralized technology, users can setup mirrors to protect their content from censorship.

d431dc9cf2731d3d51d235ce88c38fca.content: Sometimes it's important that information stays online. When political repression takes place, a decentralized approach sets the foundation for a fail-proof. Information can be mirrored among trusted peers, so it becomes hard if not impossible to take down information.

heading_b23ee0b4c6b6d1a34d9474300380daae.content: Create a digital journal with friends

d3263810bcc2b06f5da4d7ddf9dffe18.content: Utilizing the Substance Cloud you can easily build your own online journal. All you need is a bunch of writers, volunteer copy editors. It doesn't hurt to have a designer too so you can customize the look of the reading experience.

aa5333b6e312f8a762bcd441d436eb0f.content: A system for knowledge transfer, science etc.
